------------------

* Added verbosity errors validate with jsonschema

* Added compatibility with aiohttp >= 1.1
* Added safe decode form and json
* Fixed extract body

------------------

* Fixed convertation from match_info

0.2.1 (2016-10-27)
------------------

* Output conversion parameter errors in response
* Fix validation

0.2.0 (2016-10-26)
